ygData.subject: Re: Thicken Mana
ygData.msgSnippet: Is Wu s Fighting Gauntlets made by enchanters then? Is this a item I could make to make some money? ... From: Farr, Robert  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Is Wu's Fighting Gauntlets made by enchanters then? Is this a item I could
make to make some money?

----- Original Message -----
From: Farr, Robert <Robert.Farr@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 21, 1999 11:14 AM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Thicken Mana


> From: "Farr, Robert" <Robert.Farr@...>
>
> It is used in the creation of magic items. So far, the only item it is
used
> for is Wu's Fighting Gauntlets.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: James [SMTP:manickd@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, December 21, 1999 10:07 AM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eqenchanters] Thicken Mana
> >
> > From: "James" <manickd@...>
> >
> > Ok I have to ask? WTF is this spell for and 200 mana casting cost at
level
> > 12 wow that blows out mana fast! I am going to OOT to go get it just
> > because
> > I dont like missing a spell for any rank. If any one can shead some
light
> > on
> > this that would be great :)
> >
> >
>
